subject: Re: Quote for Nardi Plumbing Website Enhancements
preview: Hi Taylor,  No problem - glad I could help you  Let me know if there's anything else we can do for you, always happy to help

full_threads.body:
Hi Taylor,

No problem - glad I could help you

Let me know if there's anything else we can do for you, always happy to help

All done, thank you very much Allie

Get Outlook for Mac
(Time: 10mins)

Hi Taylor,

Thanks so much for the confirmation!

Just a quick heads-up, we’ve now granted access to info@servicecore.com.au.

You can log in securely via the link below:
🔐 Access via 1Password

Let me know if you have any trouble accessing it, happy to help anytime!

Hi Allie,

Great, thanks for that. All looks to be working from my end

If you can give access, that would be great thanks. You can use this email, info@servicecore.com.au

Thanks

Taylor

Get Outlook for Mac
(Time: 15mins)

Hi Taylor,

Happy Friday!

Just confirming, I’ve added the DNS records from the Google Sheet, so that’s all set.

We can definitely give you access to the Nardi Plumbing website for the chat widget, just let us know the best email to give access to, and we’ll get it over to you.

Or, if you’d prefer, feel free to send through the setup instructions and we’re happy to take care of it for you.

Let me know if there’s anything else you need, always happy to help!
Passing this to you @allieB 🙏

Hi Andy,

Nice to meet you.

Here are a copy of the DNS records that we are needing added please: https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1t9UeDE8V4ftqpVvtXtMlMFrOJouJTFwvcTQXHEsVoBY/edit?usp=sharing

As for WP, we are just looking to add a chat widget to the website and a webhook redirect to the webforms. Would you prefer to give access or for me to send across the code/redirect link?

Thanks

Taylor
Thank you @andy- will leave a note whenever I close the ticket and create new thread moving forward 🙏

Ahh cool got it - please link in the notes next time so clear what happened.

Onwards!

hey @andy - I replied them through this: https://secure.helpscout.net/conversation/3094626527, closed it since it was a different request 🙏 I've given them the dns information.

(This ticket was related to https://nardiplumbing.com.au/services/gas-leaks/ which is why I created a new thread for DNS to make it more organized for history tracking [Tiers, ticket type] ) - https://secure.helpscout.net/conversation/3094626527,

They just replied today , so this ticket will open again once they reply🙏

They viewed it through here, I believe they just texted in this thread to loop the service core

Hi Luca!

Thanks for reaching out and we're happy to assist.

Nice to meet you Service Core. Please let us know how we can be helpful.

We've found it best for us to manage any DNS changes over email (and set-you up as Admin on WP if looking for that too).

Let us know what you're looking for.
@allieB - what was the reason for not replying above and closing the ticket? Apologies if I missed something.

hi team

i've cc'd our CRM manager within the thread

they may need access to the backend of the website or something you may be able to assist with to be able to link forms and some other items in the backend

if we can keep it in this thread so we're also in the loop

cheers

Warm Regards,

Luca Leonardi

closing this for sla

thank you team!

just wanted to enquire if you have the attached details handy?

we need to give them to our CRM provider to update details on the website

attached is screenshot for reference
Warm Regards,

(Time: 3mins) - put page to draft mode

Hey team,

Happy Monday! Just confirming that the page at nardiplumbing.com.au/services/gas-leaks has been taken off the live site and is now in draft mode.

Let me know if there’s anything else I can help with!

action.text: Adriane Roa assigned to Adriane Roa

full_threads.body:
hey team

https://nardiplumbing.com.au/services/gas-leaks/

this page has content on it for blocked drain work - can we draft it at the moment and take it off the live site

Warm Regards,
